summary: Compares the value of two input data.
description: The data port value type can be either <doc-valuetype translate=no>Double</doc-valuetype> or <doc-valuetype translate=no>Integer</doc-valuetype> and can be changed using the block configuration dialog.

dataPorts.Value1: is the first value to compare.
dataPorts.Value2: is the second value to compare.

controlPorts.Equal: is activated when the input data values are equal.
controlPorts.Greater: is activated when the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value1</doc-idp-name> is greater than the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value2</doc-idp-name> (<doc-idp-name translate=no>Value1</doc-idp-name> > <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value2</doc-idp-name>).
controlPorts.Lesser: is activated when the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value1</doc-idp-name> is smaller than the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value2</doc-idp-name> (<doc-idp-name translate=no>Value1</doc-idp-name> < <doc-idp-name translate=no>Value2</doc-idp-name>).
